root.query: "SELECT '".LANG_ESCAPE("permdenied")."' action_error,'0' action_commit,'-1' action_go FROM (SELECT a.id,".check_sql($page).",e.id_usuario,d.id_grupo FROM tbl_${page} a LEFT JOIN tbl_registros e ON e.id_aplicacion='".page2id($page)."' AND e.id_registro=a.id AND e.primero='1' LEFT JOIN tbl_usuarios d ON e.id_usuario=d.id WHERE a.id='".abs($id)."') z WHERE NOT ".check_sql($page,"delete")
"SELECT '".LANG_ESCAPE("permdenied")."' action_error,'0' action_commit,'-1' action_go FROM (SELECT 1) a WHERE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_${page} WHERE id='".abs($id)."')=0"
